data.name: Harry Is A Porter
data.detailed_description:
Harry Is A Porter is an unusual adventure game heavily focused on car driving.

Help Harry Find His Memory
Harry wakes up with amnesia and becomes a freight driver for a fruit store. He tries to retrieve his memory from his daily life, but it is not a peaceful life that awaits him...

Use Your Skills to Drive
You need to complete the tasks arranged by Joe, the owner of the fruit store. Drive the truck to different places and collect the assigned goods. While completing different tasks, you need to solve various interesting puzzles.

Game Features
· Lovely painting style
· Incredible driving experience
· Explore different terrain
· Many strange trees
· Powerful bomb fruits

data.short_description: One day, you suddenly find yourself a porter who is driving a truck in a village. Your driving skills will be perfected after completing different tasks. When you become proficient in driving your truck, you can challenge more interesting levels.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
